document_data.name: Road to Enlightenment
document_data.mainbody: The '''Road to Enlightenment''', or the '''Enlightened Way''', was located in [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}
document_data.Description: The Road to Enlightenment was one of the largest streets in Golden Huzuz. It entered the city for the southwest corner at the [[Gulf Gate]], then traveled directly northeast to the courtyard that housed the [[Golden Mosque]] and other mosques to the [[Zakharan pantheon|Enlightened gods]]. The Enlightened Way served as the main boundary between the [[South District]] and [[Peasants' District]] before entering the [[Pilgrims' District]] on its approach to the mosques.
